mapper.sql: id, name, update_user, DATE_FORMAT(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_date, create_user, DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_date
mapper.update: update mp_bill_discount_model set del_flag=0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into mp_bill_discount_model
id,
name,
update_user,
update_date,
create_user,
create_date,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update mp_bill_discount_model
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
